publicwhip.spmotion: *S2M-2241.1 Miss Annabel Goldie: Victims and Witnessesâ€”As an amendment to motion (S2M-2241) in the name of Hugh Henry, insert at end "; believes, however, that the best support and protection that can be given to witnesses and victims is to cut crime in Scotland, and therefore calls for a greatly-increased police presence in our communities to deter and detect crime, a review of the use of bail and an end to automatic early release from prisons."
